Class Student

java.lang.Object
  Student

public class Student
extends java.lang.Object

Class that describes the fields and methods of a student, including a name, and exams and an average exam mark.

Version:
v1.0 Nov 8th, 2016
Author:
Vinay Punwani

Method Detail

allPassingMarks

public java.lang.Boolean allPassingMarks()
Method allPassingMarks which checks whether the student has passed all exams

Returns:
The return value which is true if the student has passed all the exams and false otherwise

calculateAverageMark

public double calculateAverageMark()
Method calculateAverageMark which calculates the average of all exam marks

Returns:
The return value which is the calculated average of all exam marks based on values in the exam mark array

calculateTotalPassedExams

public int calculateTotalPassedExams()
Method calculateTotalPassedExams which enumerates the total number of exams within the inputted exam mark array that have passing grades

Returns:
The return value which is the total number of passed exams from the array

checkValidExamMark

public java.lang.Boolean checkValidExamMark(int mark)
Method checkValidExamMark which verifies that the entered exam mark is valid and is between the lowest and highest possible exam mark

Parameters:
mark - A parameter which holds the value of the entered exam mark
Returns:
The return value which is true if the mark is valid, false otherwise

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Method getName which returns the student's saved name

Returns:
The return value which is the String of the student's name

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Method main which creates a new student with a name, then prompts the user to enter exam marks. Then displays relevant student information and exam averages, how many exams were passed and whether the student has passed all the exams

Parameters:
args - A parameter representing values passed to the main method

promptStudentMarks

public void promptStudentMarks()
Method promptStudentMarks which prompts the user to enter new exam marks for a specific student, validates the marks, then adds them to the exam marks array holding all the marks

setName

public void setName(java.lang.String name)
Method setName which validates and sets a new student name from a passed in parameter

Parameters:
name - A parameter String which is the new name of the student
